unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing News: Is Your Engagement Koi Mazak Hai?
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing News: Is Your Engagement Koi Mazak Hai?

unnormalised: Are you throwing content into the digital Ganga and hoping something sticks? Turns out, even pandits use follower analytics these days! Understanding who's actually seeing your reels and stories is crucial, especially if you're aiming for that Bollywood dream.
normalised: Are you throwing content into the digital Ganga and hoping something sticks? Turns out, even pandits use follower analytics these days! Understanding who is actually seeing your reels and stories is crucial, especially if you are aiming for that Bollywood dream.

unnormalised: Recent reports show many Indian influencers are only scratching the surface. They're focusing on vanity metrics (likes, numbers of followers) and missing the real gold: demographic breakdowns, peak engagement times (is 3:00 PM your golden hour?), and content performance.
normalised: Recent reports show many Indian influencers are only scratching the surface. They are focusing on vanity metrics (likes, numbers of followers) and missing the real gold: demographic breakdowns, peak engagement times (is three PM your golden hour?), and content performance.

unnormalised: Think of it like analyzing cricket scores after a tense India-Pakistan match. Without understanding the key plays, you're just looking at numbers.
normalised: Think of it like analyzing cricket scores after a tense India Pakistan match. Without understanding the key plays, you are just looking at numbers.

unnormalised: Platforms like Instagram & YouTube offer analytics, but third-party tools give even deeper insights. Are your "Bhabhis" loving your cooking videos? Are "Chachas" reacting to your political takes? Find out!
normalised: Platforms like Instagram and YouTube offer analytics, but third party tools give even deeper insights. Are your "Bhabhis" loving your cooking videos? Are "Chachas" reacting to your political takes? Find out!

unnormalised: Experts recommend reviewing your analytics at least once a month - maybe on the 5th of the month around 11:00 hrs, or maybe the auspicious date of Diwali, 24/10/2024. Don't just post and pray! Use data to understand your audience and create content that truly resonates. Your ROI will thank you for it. Remember, understanding follower analytics is more important than just reaching 100K followers by 15/08/2024!
normalised: Experts recommend reviewing your analytics at least once a month - maybe on the fifth of the month around eleven hundred hours, or maybe the auspicious date of Diwali, twenty fourth october two thousand and twenty four. Do not just post and pray! Use data to understand your audience and create content that truly resonates. Your R O I will thank you for it. Remember, understanding follower analytics is more important than just reaching one hundred thousand followers by fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four!
